purpose: defines environmental backdrops and scene contexts for sdxl prompts, spanning minimal color fields, abstract patterns, cosmic voids, surreal realms, nature, and architectural interiors/exteriors

categories.minimal_color_backdrops: flat or gradient color fields and simple, low-detail backgrounds (often using __std/color/extended__ placeholders)
categories.geometric_abstract: abstract shapes, symbols, data streams, hexagons, and bold graphic/geometric pattern backdrops
categories.organic_abstract: swirling ink, tendrils, shadows, floral and cloud-like organic forms and textures
categories.cosmic_void: voids, haze, stars, moons, luminous orbs, and wide abstract cosmic spaces
categories.surreal_otherworlds: alien, demonic, fantasy, and surreal landscapes or structures beyond realistic settings
categories.natural_landscapes: forests, rivers, seaside, fields, sunsets, paths, and reflective water scenes
categories.architecture_interiors: urban skylines, cathedrals, halls, labs, rooms, walls, furniture, boxing rings, and cavernous spaces
